TEXT.S: Dick Barnett nalecuhan i Gary, Indiana, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Dick Barnett i 1959 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 4, namapili' tu nu Syracuse Nationals putiput. 10 bulad 2 demiad, 1936 a mihca, Dick Barnett, miunduay.
